name: ASSIGNMENT_DATA_LOADS
description: This table holds information about the individual loads that have contributed specific periods of roster assignment and provider attribution.

columns.name: ASGN_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the assignment data record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ASGN_LOAD_ID
columns.description: The individual data loads that have contributed to this roster assignment period.
